description:
Harusaki Chiwa is Eita`s childhood friend. Her friends sometimes call her "chihuahua" because of her petite physique. She used to practice kendo starting in elementary school, but had to give it up due to a critical injury in a car accident the year before the story begins. She does not give up easily and constantly fights Masuzu for Eita`s affections. She is a terrible cook.
Source: Wiki
name: Harusaki Chiwa
